title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior of custom cookie name in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1
description: The documentation for Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name should affect URL rewriting, but the observed behavior does not match the expected behavior.
OB: The observed behavior is not mentioned.
EB: Expected result: Following the information in chapter 7.1.1, I would expect the Reload link to be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Set a custom cookie name in the servlet configuration. 2. Access the application and perform an action that triggers URL rewriting. 3. Observe the URL generated and compare it to the expected result.
